discourse_list.title: Introducing the governance stats and tracker dashboard

content.content: With the objective of exapanding the tools available to easily visualize some important information regarding governance and delegation, as well as displaying all items that are currently taking place in the governance process from forum posts to executive votes, I want to introduce you to v1 of GovAlpha’s Governance Dashboard, this dashboard features two main sections: the Stats and the Tracker section.  761×215 10.1 KB   Stats This section consists of a series of charts, tables and counters displaying information regarding MKR delegation, stakes and voter weights. Some of the data that can be found here includes:  MKR delegated and delegator count for all recognized and shadow delegates as well as total amounts for all delegates. Total and idividual amount of MKR staked and delegated. Current and historical vote weights for delegates. Amount of poll voters per month.   Governance dashboard - stats section1903×958 95.3 KB   Tracker The tracker section consists of a UI for GovAlpha’s Governance Tracker which aims to present the data in a more user friendly way as well as adding some extra functionality such as custom filters, current supported filters are:  Active proposals High impact proposals Proposals ending this week   Governance dashboard - tracker section1920×959 61 KB   Feedback Any feedback, comments or suggestions you can provide are more than welcome so we can keep improving and making this tool more useful for everyone  If you think about someone who might find this dashboard helpful, please feel free to share it!
This is great, very useful info and very very easy to read!!
This looks great. Looking forward to utilizing it to see all that it can do.
This topic was automatically closed 14 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
